General.Name: Anhui Huilong Agricultural Means of Production Co Ltd
General.Description: Anhui Huilong Agricultural Means of Production Co.,Ltd. operates in the agricultural services industry in China and internationally. The company participates in social welfare activities, such as epidemic prevention, disaster relief, poverty alleviation, and student aid. It also provides agricultural assistance services comprising farmer training, technical consultation, agricultural technology promotion, and test demonstration services. In addition, the company provides fertilizers and pesticides; and deals in methyl ether, cresol, chlorotoluene, m-chloroaniline, spices and flavors, thymol, L-menthol, and other products. It offers its products in the United States, Russia, Japan, India, Italy, and internationally. The company was founded in 1990 and is based in Hefei, China.
